section1.header: Transforming the world's health one click at a time
section1.pg: Virufy is a volunteer-run organization that uses artificial intelligence (AI) to diagnose COVID-10 from cough patterns, rapidly and at no cost through use of a smartphone

section2.pg1:
Virufy is changing how healthcare is experienced,
putting power in people's hands through fast, free disease detection.
section2.pg2: No matter where you are in the world, all you need is a mobile device and the Virufy app.

section4.pg1: In March 2020, we began pioneering an AI-powered mobile app to detect COVID-19.
section4.pg2: Now, Virufighters from five continents are involved, all committed to making disease identification instant, universal and free through with the help of technology innovation

vision.pg1: We aspire to be the leading not-for-profit organization for technology-enabled disease identification.
vision.pg2: Our innovations aim to offer superior detection for patients, clinicians and governments.
vision.pg3: We will be force for transforming global healthcare and inspiring support and investment in this mission.

transform.pg: Healthcare systems are expensive and slow to change, but with technology we can drive transformation globally

world.pg: We exist for everyone regardless of  background. We recognize the most pressing need is in emerging markets, but that healthcare can be inaccessible even in developed markets

free.pg: For many, healthcare is unaffordable. We see no reason why people should have to pay for expensive prevention and detection when it can be free with the help of technology

health.pg: People’s health is the most precious thing in the world. From health comes happiness, and from that comes social and economic success

oneTap.pg: Our sole focus is on using technology to improve people’s health — that’s all we do. Our app(s) are sophisticated yet intuitive, delivering rapid detection to prevent virus spread and save lives

mobile.pg: Mobile devices have become ubiquitous in developing markets and can be utilized to deliver healthcare
